title: Menara Aria Harbourbay Downtown
subtitle: STP Project
description: Sewage Treatment Plant project for high-rise residential building in Harbourbay Downtown.
fullDescription: PT Toolmate Technologies Indonesia completed a comprehensive Sewage Treatment Plant (STP) project for Menara Aria at Harbourbay Downtown. The project involved installation of treatment systems including control panels, pumps, and processing equipment for efficient wastewater management in this premium residential tower.
scope: Control panel installation with VISALUX systems
